pullRequest.title: Add function for aborting compilation with bad value type operations
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently, the IL generator will abort compilation when an operation with an unresolved CP reference that may need value type handling is encountered. To aid readability and maintainability, this commit
adds a new helper function that encapsulates the code that does the abort. All instances of similar code are replaced with a call to this new function.
Signed-off-by: Leonardo Banderali leonardo2718@protonmail.com

nodes.bodyText: I'm not a fan of this name but I couldn't think of anything else off the top of my head. I'm open to suggestions if anyone has a better name.

commit.message:
Add function for aborting compilation with bad value type operations

Currently, the IL generator will abort compilation when an operation
with an unresolved CP reference that may need value type handling
is encountered. To aid readability and maintainability, this commit
adds a new helper function that encapsulates the code that does the
abort. All instances of similar code are replaced with a call
to this new function.

Signed-off-by: Leonardo Banderali <leonardo2718@protonmail.com>
